channel.title: Deleting some graphics?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've been stuck trying to get through this problem deleting some animations and pictures from the main title screen.
These are the things I am trying to delete: [img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b622/im4ever12c/t4x_zps2ca4c401.png[/img]
Can someone please help me? I'm using the client (Pk Planet [317]) Thanks!

item.title: Deleting some graphics?
item.dc:creator: @Mike_101994 Mike 101994
item.description:
@Mike_101994 wrote:

To remove the logo it should be in your client.java folder. remove these two lines of code in the drawlogo() method:
sprite = new Sprite(titleStreamLoader, “logo”, 0);
sprite.drawSprite(382 - sprite.myWidth / 2 - 128, 18);

To remove the flames delete everything or comment out everything in the calcFlamesPosition() method also in client.java. Hope I helped.

Read full topic
